about_the_game:
This DLC is solely for donating the author.


Thank you for your support, which is my biggest motivation.
Please feel free to provide any suggestions about this game at any time.

The game homepage will periodically update the list of donors.
After purchasing the DLC donation, if you want to be displayed on the list of donors, you can inform the author via email with your custom name and the amount donated.
detailed_description:
This DLC is solely for donating the author.


Thank you for your support, which is my biggest motivation.
Please feel free to provide any suggestions about this game at any time.

After purchasing the DLC donation, if you want to be displayed on the list of donors, you can inform the author via email with your custom name and the amount donated.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: kernel 2.0
  • Processor: all
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: all
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: kernel>4.0
  • Processor: all
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: all
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
